short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lists the top upcoming movies and Tv Shows

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seamlessly browse upcoming movies and TV shows with trailers directly from your Chrome browser!

Overview
This Chrome extension is designed for movie and TV show enthusiasts who want to stay updated with the latest releases. With a clean and intuitive interface, you can easily explore upcoming movies and TV series, watch trailers, and get key release information—all in one place!

Key Features
Switch Between Movies and TV Shows: A simple dropdown menu allows you to toggle between upcoming movie releases and TV series premieres.
Real-Time Data: Get accurate and up-to-date information about the latest movies and TV shows, including release dates and popularity trends.
Watch Trailers Instantly: Click on a movie or TV show to instantly watch its official trailer on YouTube.
Responsive Design: Enjoy a sleek, visually appealing layout that automatically adjusts to display up to four items per row for an optimized viewing experience.
Interactive Hover Effects: Hover over any poster to reveal a play button that lets you view the trailer directly.
How It Works
The extension fetches movie and TV show data using The Movie Database (TMDB) API, ensuring that the information you receive is reliable and up-to-date.
Simply choose your preferred media type—either "Movies" or "TV Shows"—and the extension will list the most popular upcoming releases for the current year.
Click on any poster to open the trailer in a new tab, giving you a quick preview of what to expect.
TMDB API Credits
This product uses the TMDB API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDB. The Movie Database (TMDB) is a popular, community-driven source of detailed information on films and television series. While the extension uses TMDB’s extensive API to fetch movie and TV data, all content rights belong to TMDB and its respective licensors.

For more information about TMDB, visit their official site: The Movie Database (TMDB).

Why You’ll Love This Extension
This extension is perfect for users who want to stay on top of what’s new in entertainment without needing to search multiple platforms. Whether you’re a cinephile tracking upcoming blockbusters or a TV show fan waiting for the next season, this extension makes it easy to discover and preview content with just a few clicks.
